scripts.pack: bun test && bun tsc --noEmit && bun bench.ts && bun examples.ts > examples.md && bun build index.ts --sourcemap=linked --minify --outdir=dist && tsc index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist && bun run show-size
scripts.show-size: gzip -9 -k dist/index.js && ls -lh dist/index.js.gz && rm dist/index.js.gz
